MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KA30 postcode area of Largs. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of difficult digging conditions and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3:35pm on Thursday, 11th March 2021
